name: Paradise City VR
description: Welcome to Paradise City - the city that never sleeps. Prepare yourself for an amazing experience full of beautiful girls. Explore area and discover multiple locations where you can meet and watch naughty girls. You’ll feel like in a real paradise... So… are you ready to see all of this?
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Процессор: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent) Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent) Место на диске: 3500 MB
